welcome.body: We pray that you get the full blessings from this Ramadan and spend quality time with Allah’s Words.<2/><2/> Quran.com has lots of exciting new features to share with you, and we’re asking for your support to do more. <2/><2/> Please <0>click here</0> to learn more and to donate to a project that helps millions of users access the guidance of the Quran every month.
welcome.title: It's the Month of the Quran!
